name: Yelan
title: "Valley Orchid" Yelan
desc: The world is vast and infinite, the solitary one comes and goes as she pleases.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Yelan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Lingering Lifeline
skills.desc: Deals 3 <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro DMG. This character gains 2 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Breakthrough stacks.

skills.name: Depth-Clarion Dice
skills.desc: Deals 1 <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro DMG, creates 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Exquisite Throw.

skills.name: Breakthrough
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Breakthrough.
